statements: SELECT * FROM project_progress;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, deadline FROM project_progress;
SELECT * FROM project_progress WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to FROM project_progress WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM project_progress WHERE deadline > '2023-01-01';
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM project_progress WHERE assigned_to = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM project_progress WHERE completion_status = FALSE AND deadline < '2022-12-31';
SELECT task_id, task_name, assigned_to FROM project_progress WHERE assigned_to LIKE 'Ma%';
SELECT * FROM project_progress WHERE deadline BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT task_id, task_name, assigned_to, deadline FROM project_progress ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, deadline FROM project_progress ORDER BY task_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM project_progress WHERE deadline IS NULL;
SELECT task_id, assigned_to, deadline FROM project_progress WHERE task_name ILIKE '%report%';
SELECT * FROM project_progress WHERE task_name = 'Code Review' AND completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, deadline FROM project_progress WHERE task_name IN ('Design UI', 'Implement Backend');
SELECT DISTINCT assigned_to FROM project_progress;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM project_progress;
SELECT AVG(task_id) FROM project_progress;
SELECT * FROM project_progress WHERE task_name LIKE 'Create%' OR task_name LIKE '%Update%';
SELECT assigned_to, COUNT(*) FROM project_progress GROUP BY assigned_to;
SELECT task_id, task_name, assigned_to, deadline, completion_status FROM project_progress
SELECT * FROM project_progress WHERE deadline >= '2022-12-31' AND assigned_to = 'John Doe'
SELECT task_name, completion_status FROM project_progress WHERE assigned_to = 'Jane Smith' AND completion_status = TRUE
SELECT COUNT(task_id) AS total_tasks FROM project_progress
SELECT task_id, task_name, assigned_to, deadline FROM project_progress WHERE completion_status = FALSE
SELECT * FROM project_progress WHERE deadline BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT assigned_to FROM project_progress
SELECT AVG(deadline) AS avg_deadline FROM project_progress
SELECT * FROM project_progress ORDER BY deadline DESC
SELECT task_id, task_name, assigned_to, deadline FROM project_progress WHERE task_name LIKE '%research%'
SELECT * FROM project_progress WHERE assigned_to IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie')
SELECT * FROM project_progress WHERE deadline < CURRENT_DATE
SELECT * FROM project_progress WHERE completion_status IS NULL
SELECT assigned_to, COUNT(task_id) AS total_tasks FROM project_progress GROUP BY assigned_to HAVING COUNT(task_id) > 2
SELECT * FROM project_progress WHERE task_id NOT IN (1, 5, 10)
SELECT task_id, task_name, assigned_to, deadline FROM project_progress WHERE completion_status = TRUE ORDER BY deadline ASC
SELECT * FROM project_progress WHERE task_name ILIKE '%design%'
SELECT MAX(deadline) AS latest_deadline FROM project_progress
SELECT task_id, task_name, assigned_to, deadline FROM project_progress WHERE completion_status = TRUE AND deadline < CURRENT_DATE
SELECT * FROM project_progress WHERE completion_status = FALSE AND deadline > CURRENT_DATE
SELECT * FROM TaskAssignments;
SELECT id, task_name, assigned_to FROM TaskAssignments;
SELECT task_name, COUNT(*) FROM TaskAssignments GROUP BY task_name;
SELECT * FROM Deadlines;
SELECT task_id, deadline_date FROM Deadlines;
SELECT TaskAssignments.task_name, Deadlines.deadline_date FROM TaskAssignments JOIN Deadlines ON TaskAssignments.id = Deadlines.task_id;
SELECT * FROM TaskAssignments WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, deadline FROM TaskAssignments WHERE deadline > '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, task_name FROM TaskAssignments ORDER BY task_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM TaskAssignments LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM TaskAssignments OFFSET 5;
SELECT DISTINCT assigned_to FROM TaskAssignments;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TaskAssignments WHERE completion_status = FALSE;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TaskAssignments WHERE assigned_to LIKE '%John%';
SELECT task_name, deadline, completion_status FROM TaskAssignments WHERE deadline BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT task_name, completion_status FROM TaskAssignments WHERE assigned_to = 'Alice' AND completion_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM TaskAssignments WHERE task_name LIKE '%report%' OR task_name LIKE '%presentation%';
SELECT MAX(deadline) AS max_deadline FROM TaskAssignments;
SELECT AVG(deadline) AS avg_deadline_days FROM TaskAssignments;
SELECT assigned_to, AVG(deadline) AS avg_deadline_days FROM TaskAssignments GROUP BY assigned_to;
SELECT task_name, COUNT(*) AS tasks_count FROM TaskAssignments GROUP BY task_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM TaskAssignments WHERE id = 1;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to FROM TaskAssignments WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM TaskAssignments WHERE assigned_to = 'John';
SELECT * FROM TaskAssignments WHERE deadline < '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, task_name, assigned_to FROM TaskAssignments WHERE completion_status = FALSE AND deadline > '2022-03-15';
SELECT * FROM TaskAssignments WHERE task_name LIKE '%project%';
SELECT task_name, assigned_to FROM TaskAssignments WHERE completion_status = TRUE AND deadline >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT id, task_name, assigned_to, deadline FROM TaskAssignments WHERE deadline BETWEEN '2022-05-01' AND '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM TaskAssignments ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TaskAssignments;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, deadline, completion_status FROM TaskAssignments WHERE completion_status = FALSE ORDER BY deadline ASC;
SELECT * FROM TaskAssignments WHERE task_name IN ('Meeting', 'Presentation', 'Training');
SELECT task_id, deadline_date FROM Deadlines WHERE deadline_date < '2022-07-01';
SELECT TaskAssignments.id, TaskAssignments.task_name, Deadlines.deadline_date FROM TaskAssignments JOIN Deadlines ON TaskAssignments.id = Deadlines.task_id;
SELECT TaskAssignments.id, TaskAssignments.task_name, Deadlines.deadline_date FROM TaskAssignments LEFT JOIN Deadlines ON TaskAssignments.id = Deadlines.task_id;
SELECT TaskAssignments.id, TaskAssignments.task_name, Deadlines.deadline_date FROM TaskAssignments RIGHT JOIN Deadlines ON TaskAssignments.id = Deadlines.task_id;

SELECT TaskAssignments.id, TaskAssignments.task_name, Deadlines.deadline_date FROM TaskAssignments JOIN Deadlines ON TaskAssignments.id = Deadlines.task_id WHERE Deadlines.deadline_date < '2022-09-01';

SELECT TaskAssignments.id, TaskAssignments.task_name, Deadlines.deadline_date FROM TaskAssignments JOIN Deadlines ON TaskAssignments.id = Deadlines.task_id WHERE TaskAssignments.deadline > Deadlines.deadline_date;

SELECT TaskAssignments.id, TaskAssignments.deadline, Deadlines.deadline_date FROM TaskAssignments INNER JOIN Deadlines ON TaskAssignments.id = Deadlines.task_id WHERE TaskAssignments.completion_status = TRUE AND Deadlines.deadline_date > '2022-08-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_urgent_tasks FROM TaskAssignments WHERE deadline < '2022-04-01';
SELECT * FROM task_assignments;
SELECT task_id, task_description FROM task_assignments;
SELECT assignee_name, deadline FROM task_assignments;
SELECT task_id, task_description, assignee_name FROM task_assignments;
SELECT * FROM deadlines;
SELECT deadline_id, task_id FROM deadlines;
SELECT task_id, due_date FROM deadlines;
SELECT * FROM completion_status;
SELECT status_id, task_id FROM completion_status;
SELECT task_id, status_description FROM completion_status;
SELECT task_id, status_description, completion_date FROM completion_status;
SELECT task_id, task_description, assignee_name, deadline FROM task_assignments WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT task_id, task_description, assignee_name, deadline FROM task_assignments WHERE completion_status = FALSE;
SELECT task_id, task_description, assignee_name, deadline FROM task_assignments WHERE assignee_name = 'Alice';
SELECT task_id, due_date, reminder_date FROM deadlines WHERE due_date >= '2022-11-01';
SELECT task_id, status_description, completion_date FROM completion_status WHERE status_description LIKE 'in progress%';
SELECT task_id, status_description, completion_date FROM completion_status WHERE completion_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT task_id, task_description, assignee_name, deadline FROM task_assignments ORDER BY deadline ASC;
SELECT task_id, task_description, assignee_name, deadline FROM task_assignments ORDER BY task_description DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_description, assignee_name, deadline FROM task_assignments LIMIT 5 OFFSET 10;
SELECT * FROM task_assignments;
SELECT task_description, assignee_name, deadline FROM task_assignments WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT task_description, assignee_name, deadline FROM task_assignments WHERE deadline <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT task_description, assignee_name, deadline FROM task_assignments WHERE assignee_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT task_description, assignee_name, deadline FROM task_assignments WHERE deadline >= '2023-01-01' AND completion_status = FALSE;
SELECT task_id, COUNT(*) AS num_assigned_tasks FROM task_assignments GROUP BY task_id;
SELECT task_description, COUNT(*) AS num_assigned_tasks FROM task_assignments WHERE completion_status = FALSE GROUP BY task_description HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT t.task_id, t.task_description, c.status_description FROM task_assignments t JOIN completion_status c ON t.task_id = c.task_id WHERE t.completion_status = FALSE;
SELECT t.task_id, t.task_description, d.due_date FROM task_assignments t JOIN deadlines d ON t.task_id = d.task_id WHERE d.due_date <= '2023-03-31';
SELECT t.task_id, t.task_description, c.status_description FROM task_assignments t JOIN completion_status c ON t.task_id = c.task_id WHERE c.completion_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-03-31';
SELECT t.task_id, t.task_description, d.due_date FROM task_assignments t JOIN deadlines d ON t.task_id = d.task_id WHERE d.reminder_date IS NULL;
SELECT t.task_id, t.task_description, d.due_date FROM task_assignments t JOIN deadlines d ON t.task_id = d.task_id WHERE d.due_date > '2023-07-01' AND d.reminder_date = '2023-06-30';
SELECT t.task_id, t.task_description, c.completion_date FROM task_assignments t JOIN completion_status c ON t.task_id = c.task_id WHERE c.completion_date >= '2023-04-01';

SELECT t.task_id, AVG(DATEDIFF(c.completion_date, d.due_date)) AS avg_delay_days FROM task_assignments t JOIN deadlines d ON t.task_id = d.task_id JOIN completion_status c ON t.task_id = c.task_id WHERE c.completion_date IS NOT NULL AND c.completion_date > d.due_date;

SELECT task_description, assignee_name, deadline, status_description FROM task_assignments t JOIN completion_status c ON t.task_id = c.task_id WHERE t.completion_status = TRUE AND c.completion_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT t.task_id, t.task_description, d.due_date, d.reminder_date FROM task_assignments t JOIN deadlines d ON t.task_id = d.task_id WHERE d.reminder_date BETWEEN '2023-04-01' AND '2023-06-30';

SELECT t.task_description, t.assignee_name, d.due_date, c.completion_date FROM task_assignments t JOIN deadlines d ON t.task_id = d.task_id JOIN completion_status c ON t.task_id = c.task_id WHERE t.completion_status = FALSE AND c.status_description LIKE '%pending%';

SELECT t.task_description, t.assignee_name, d.due_date, c.completion_date FROM task_assignments t JOIN deadlines d ON t.task_id = d.task_id JOIN completion_status c ON t.task_id = c.task_id WHERE t.task_id IN (SELECT task_id FROM deadlines WHERE due_date < '2023-05-01');

SELECT t.task_id, t.task_description, c.status_description, c.completion_date FROM task_assignments t JOIN completion_status c ON t.task_id = c.task_id WHERE t.completion_status = TRUE AND c.completion_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY c.completion_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM TaskAssignments;
SELECT task_id, assignee_id, task_description FROM TaskAssignments WHERE completion_status = true;
SELECT assignee_name, assignee_role FROM AssigneeDetails;
SELECT * FROM Deadlines WHERE reminder_date <= CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT project_name, total_tasks, completed_tasks, progress FROM ProjectProgress;
SELECT task_description, deadline FROM TaskAssignments ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT assignee_name, assignee_role, assignee_department FROM AssigneeDetails WHERE assignee_role = 'Developer';
SELECT task_id, assignee_id, task_description FROM TaskAssignments WHERE deadline >= '2022-05-01';
SELECT project_name, progress FROM ProjectProgress WHERE progress < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM Deadlines WHERE deadline_date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30';
SELECT assignee_id, assignee_name, assignee_department FROM AssigneeDetails ORDER BY assignee_name ASC;
SELECT task_id, task_description, deadline FROM TaskAssignments WHERE assignee_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM ProjectProgress WHERE completed_tasks < total_tasks * 0.5;
SELECT assignee_name, assignee_role, assignee_department FROM AssigneeDetails WHERE assignee_department = 'IT';
SELECT task_id, task_description FROM TaskAssignments WHERE completion_status = false;
SELECT project_name, total_tasks, completed_tasks, progress FROM ProjectProgress ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT project_name, completed_tasks, progress FROM ProjectProgress WHERE progress >= 75.00;
SELECT deadline_id, deadline_date, reminder_date FROM Deadlines WHERE task_id = 5;
SELECT assignee_name, assignee_role FROM AssigneeDetails WHERE assignee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT task_description, deadline, completion_status FROM TaskAssignments WHERE task_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM TaskAssignments WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT task_description, completion_status FROM TaskAssignments WHERE deadline > '2022-12-31';
SELECT assignee_name FROM AssigneeDetails WHERE assignee_role = 'Developer';
SELECT assignee_name, assignee_department FROM AssigneeDetails WHERE assignee_id = 3;
SELECT task_description, completion_status FROM TaskAssignments JOIN AssigneeDetails ON TaskAssignments.assignee_id = AssigneeDetails.assignee_id;
SELECT task_description, deadline_date FROM TaskAssignments JOIN Deadlines ON TaskAssignments.task_id = Deadlines.task_id;
SELECT project_name, progress FROM ProjectProgress WHERE completed_tasks < total_tasks;
SELECT assignee_name, assignee_role, assignee_department FROM AssigneeDetails JOIN TaskAssignments ON AssigneeDetails.assignee_id = TaskAssignments.assignee_id;
SELECT project_name, total_tasks, completed_tasks FROM ProjectProgress WHERE progress >= 50;

SELECT assignee_name, assignee_role, task_description FROM AssigneeDetails JOIN TaskAssignments ON AssigneeDetails.assignee_id = TaskAssignments.assignee_id WHERE TaskAssignments.deadline < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Deadlines WHERE deadline_date < reminder_date;

SELECT assignee_name, assignee_department, task_description FROM AssigneeDetails JOIN TaskAssignments ON AssigneeDetails.assignee_id = TaskAssignments.assignee_id WHERE TaskAssignments.completion_status = 'FALSE';
SELECT project_name, (completed_tasks*100)/total_tasks AS completion_percentage FROM ProjectProgress;
SELECT assignee_name, assignee_role, assignee_department FROM AssigneeDetails WHERE assignee_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT project_name, progress FROM ProjectProgress WHERE total_tasks > 0 AND completed_tasks = total_tasks;
SELECT task_description, deadline_date, reminder_date FROM TaskAssignments JOIN Deadlines ON TaskAssignments.task_id = Deadlines.task_id;
SELECT project_name, total_tasks, completed_tasks, progress FROM ProjectProgress WHERE progress = (completed_tasks*100)/total_tasks;

SELECT assignee_name, assignee_role, task_description FROM AssigneeDetails JOIN TaskAssignments ON AssigneeDetails.assignee_id = TaskAssignments.assignee_id WHERE TaskAssignments.completion_status = TRUE;

SELECT assignee_name, assignee_role, assignee_department, project_name FROM AssigneeDetails JOIN TaskAssignments ON AssigneeDetails.assignee_id = TaskAssignments.assignee_id JOIN ProjectProgress ON TaskAssignments.task_id = ProjectProgress.project_id;
SELECT task_description, deadline_date, reminder_date FROM TaskAssignments JOIN Deadlines ON TaskAssignments.task_id = Deadlines.task_id WHERE deadline_date < reminder_date;
SELECT * FROM task_assignments;
SELECT task_id, assigned_to, task_description FROM task_assignments;
SELECT assigned_to, deadline FROM task_assignments;
SELECT * FROM deadlines;
SELECT deadline_date, reminder_date FROM deadlines;
SELECT * FROM completion_status;
SELECT task_id, status_description, completed_date FROM completion_status;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM projects;
SELECT * FROM project_tasks;
SELECT project_id, task_id FROM project_tasks;
SELECT * FROM task_assignments WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM task_assignments WHERE assigned_to = 'Alice';
SELECT task_id, deadline FROM task_assignments WHERE assigned_by = 'Bob';
SELECT * FROM deadlines WHERE reminder_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM completion_status WHERE completed_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM project_tasks WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM task_assignments WHERE task_description LIKE '%meeting%';
SELECT project_id, task_id FROM project_tasks WHERE project_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM task_assignments WHERE assigned_to = 'John' AND deadline > '2022-10-01';
SELECT task_id, assigned_by, task_description FROM task_assignments WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE project_id IN (SELECT project_id FROM project_tasks WHERE task_id = 1);
SELECT task_id, assigned_to, deadline FROM task_assignments WHERE assigned_to LIKE '%Smith%' AND deadline BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT t.task_id, t.assigned_to, t.deadline, p.project_name FROM task_assignments t JOIN project_tasks pt ON t.task_id = pt.task_id JOIN projects p ON pt.project_id = p.project_id WHERE p.project_name = 'Project X';
SELECT t.task_id, t.assigned_by, c.status_description FROM task_assignments t JOIN completion_status c ON t.task_id = c.task_id WHERE c.completed_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT p.project_id, p.project_name, t.task_id FROM projects p JOIN project_tasks pt ON p.project_id = pt.project_id JOIN task_assignments t ON pt.task_id = t.task_id ORDER BY p.project_name ASC;
SELECT t.task_id, t.assigned_to, d.deadline_date FROM task_assignments t JOIN deadlines d ON t.task_id = d.task_id WHERE d.reminder_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT p.project_id, p.project_name, COUNT(pt.project_task_id) AS task_count FROM projects p JOIN project_tasks pt ON p.project_id = pt.project_id GROUP BY p.project_id, p.project_name;
SELECT t.task_id, t.task_description, d.deadline_date FROM task_assignments t LEFT JOIN deadlines d ON t.task_id = d.task_id WHERE d.deadline_date IS NULL;
SELECT project_id, project_name, COUNT(pt.task_id) AS task_count FROM projects JOIN project_tasks pt USING (project_id) GROUP BY project_id, project_name HAVING task_count > 5;

SELECT t.task_id, t.assigned_to, p.project_name FROM task_assignments t JOIN project_tasks pt ON t.task_id = pt.task_id JOIN projects p ON pt.project_id = p.project_id WHERE t.deadline >= '2022-11-01' AND p.project_id = 1;
SELECT t.task_id, t.task_description, c.status_description FROM task_assignments t JOIN completion_status c ON t.task_id = c.task_id WHERE c.status_description LIKE '%pending%';

SELECT p.project_id, p.project_name, MAX(d.deadline_date) AS latest_deadline FROM projects p JOIN project_tasks pt ON p.project_id = pt.project_id JOIN deadlines d ON pt.task_id = d.task_id GROUP BY p.project_id, p.project_name;

SELECT t.task_id, t.assigned_by, p.project_name FROM task_assignments t JOIN project_tasks pt ON t.task_id = pt.task_id JOIN projects p ON pt.project_id = p.project_id WHERE p.project_name LIKE '%Software%' AND t.completion_status = FALSE;

SELECT t.task_id, t.assigned_to, p.project_name FROM task_assignments t JOIN project_tasks pt ON t.task_id = pt.task_id JOIN projects p ON pt.project_id = p.project_id WHERE p.project_name LIKE '%Development%' AND t.deadline < '2022-12-31';
SELECT t.task_id, t.assigned_by, c.completed_date FROM task_assignments t JOIN completion_status c ON t.task_id = c.task_id WHERE DATE_DIFF(NOW(), c.completed_date) < 30;

SELECT p.project_id, p.project_name, AVG(DATEDIFF(d.reminder_date, d.deadline_date)) AS avg_days_diff FROM projects p JOIN project_tasks pt ON p.project_id = pt.project_id JOIN deadlines d ON pt.task_id = d.task_id GROUP BY p.project_id, p.project_name;
SELECT t.task_id, t.assigned_to, d.reminder_date FROM task_assignments t JOIN deadlines d ON t.task_id = d.task_id WHERE d.reminder_date BETWEEN '2022-11-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT p.project_id, p.project_name, SUM(DATEDIFF(d.deadline_date, d.reminder_date)) AS total_days_diff FROM projects p JOIN project_tasks pt ON p.project_id = pt.project_id JOIN deadlines d ON pt.task_id = d.task_id GROUP BY p.project_id, p.project_name;
